document_data.mainbody: '''Dmetrio Extaminos'''<ref group=note name=note1/> was a male [[yuan-ti pureblood]] [[sorcerer]] or [[fighter]]<ref group=note name=note2/> of [[Hlondeth]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/More of the Vilhon Reach}}
document_data.Activities:
He served as the ambassador of Hlondeth to the nation of [[Sespech]].

Dmetrio was also the leader of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in Hlondeth.
document_data.Relationships: He was the son of [[Dediana Extaminos]], ruler of Hlondeth. He was also courting [[Glisena Foesmasher]], the daughter of Baron [[Thuragar Foesmasher]] of Sespech, making the relationship between Hlondeth and Sespech somewhat tense, as neither Glisena nor Thuragar were interested, but dared not offend Hlondeth, so they did not completely rebuff his advances.
